summary: Harvest module Enzy-style UI testing complete. All 5 tabs (Map, Today, Ranks, Challenges, Profile) working correctly with premium gamification elements. 100% frontend success rate.

issues: 'Made with Emergent' badge overlaps Challenges and Profile tabs in bottom navigation - requires JavaScript click to bypass. This is an external badge, not a code issue.

critical_code_review_comments: All 5 tabs have proper data-testid attributes for testing (harvest-map-tab, harvest-today-tab, harvest-leaderboard-tab, harvest-challenges-tab, harvest-profile-tab)
Bottom navigation has z-index: 9999 and position: fixed - correctly stays above content
Glass morphism stats bar uses backdrop-filter: blur(24px) for premium effect
Leaderboard period filters (Today/Week/Month/All Time) all have data-testid attributes and work correctly
Challenges filter tabs (Active/Done/All) have data-testid attributes and work correctly
Profile tab shows gradient header, total points, stats grid, and badge collection as designed
seed_data_creation: Existing test data used: 19 doors today, 1 appointment, 1 signed, 376 points, 1 day streak
context_for_next_testing_agent: Harvest module fully functional with Enzy-style premium gamification UI. All 5 tabs working: Map (with glass morphism stats), Today (streak banner, progress ring, stats grid, active competitions), Ranks (period filters, leaderboard entries), Challenges (filter tabs, challenge cards with progress), Profile (gradient header, total points, stats grid, badge collection). Use JavaScript clicks via page.evaluate() to bypass 'Made with Emergent' badge overlay on Challenges and Profile tabs.

5-tab bottom navigation.details: All 5 tabs (Map, Today, Ranks, Challenges, Profile) found with correct data-testid attributes. Navigation switches correctly between tabs.

Map tab - glass morphism stats bar.details: Map displays with pins, glass morphism stats bar shows Today: 19, Week: 19, streak flame, Signed: 1. Uses backdrop-filter: blur(24px).

Today tab - streak banner, progress ring.details: Shows Current Streak (1 day), progress ring (19 of 75 doors), stats grid (19 Doors, 1 Appts, 1 Signed, 376 Points), Active Competitions section with TEST_Daily_Sprint_Competition (17/25 doors, 68%)

Leaderboard/Ranks tab - period filter, l.details: Period filters (Today/Week/Month/All Time) work correctly. Shows Test User at #1 with 77 pts, 19 doors, 1 signed. Refresh button functional.

Challenges tab - filter tabs, challenge.details: Filter tabs (Active 4, Done 0, All 4) work correctly. Shows Active Campaigns (Weekend Door Blitz, TEST_Campaign_Admin_Console) and challenge cards (Early Bird Special - 100% complete, +30 points)

Profile tab - gradient header, total poi.details: Gradient header with flame icon, Total Points: 376, 1 day streak badge, This Week stats (19 Doors, 1 Appointments, 1 Contracts, 1 Best Streak), Badges (1/16) with tier filters (All, Legendary 0/1, Epic 0/1)

Bottom navigation clickable and visible.details: Bottom nav has z-index: 9999, position: fixed. All tabs clickable (Map, Today, Ranks require normal click; Challenges, Profile require JS click due to external 'Made with Emergent' badge)
